p: According to current scientific knowledge, mushroom β-glucans, especially triple-helix β-glucans, represent a promising therapeutic way in anti-tumor therapy due to low side effects [ 85], in allergy therapy [ 85] and others, like wound healing therapy [ 27]. Furthermore, beta-glucans can be used in vaccines [ 86] and in nanotechnology and microencapsulation [ 87]. Moreover, the most recent research shows that β-glucan extracts from edible mushrooms have coronavirus disease (COVID-19) alleviating properties by reduction of pro-inflammatory cytokines and oxidative stress [ 88].
